nodeMetric.field_description: Campaign Unique Clicks is a count of the number of people who clicked on your digital advertisements within a campaign at least once. A campaign is a grouping of ads organized by business objective.

body.summary: Campaign Unique Clicks is a count of the number of people who clicked on your digital advertisements within a campaign at least once. A campaign is a grouping of ads organized by business objective.

field_related_metrics.field_description: Ad Clicks, or simply Clicks, is a marketing metric that counts the number of times users have clicked on a digital advertisement to reach an online property.

Ad Unique Clicks is a count of the number of people who clicked on your digital advertisement at least once. This is different than Ad Clicks or Total Clicks, because this is a count of the unique people who clicked.
Ad Impressions (IMPR) is a count of the total number of times digital advertisements display on someoneâ€™s screen within the publisher's network.
